home.title: Innovation and Precision at the Heart
home.description: Ets Supers Services is a dynamic Congolese company based in Kananga, specialized in visual communication, printing, decoration, professional cleaning and general services.

about.title: About us
about.creationDesc1: Ets Supers Services is a Congolese individual enterprise created on August 27, 2020.
about.creationDesc2: It is registered in the Trade and Personal Property Credit Register (RCCM) under the number:
about.objectiveDesc: The company was created in Kananga to improve access and quality of:
about.visionDesc: Our vision is to always satisfy our customers by offering:

visionPoints.quality: A wide range of quality services

clients.title: Main Clients
clients.intro: Since its creation, Ets Supers Services has gained the trust of national and international organizations through its professionalism, rigor and strict adherence to deadlines.

un.title: United Nations Agencies
un.description: We collaborate with several UN agencies such as UNDP, UNFPA and UNHCR, offering services adapted to international standards.

ngo.title: International NGOs
ngo.description: Our partners include world-renowned NGOs like Catholic Relief Services, COOPI and Cordaid, for which we provide reliable and efficient solutions.

companies.title: Companies & Institutions
companies.description: We also support private companies, government institutions and public administrations in their various projects.

schools.title: Schools & Associations
schools.description: Our expertise extends to schools, churches, local associations and individuals, offering accessible and high-quality services.

clients.conclusion: Our commitment is to build sustainable partnerships based on trust, quality and operational excellence.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.note: We are available for your quote requests, partnerships and professional collaborations.

footer.description: Congolese company registered in the Democratic Republic of Congo, specialized in printing, visual communication, decoration, professional cleaning and general services.
footer.followUsText: Stay connected with us on our social platforms.
